title: ‘There Is No Limit’: Biniam Girmay Eyes Success in Spring Classics after Historic Tour de France Success
content:
Girmay remembers the dominance of Philippe Gilbert and Peter Sagan in the classics. It’s something the African is keen to emulate.

Read the full article at ‘There Is No Limit’: Biniam Girmay Eyes Success in Spring Classics after Historic Tour de France Success on Velo.
author: sstokes
